backend/main.mo: Motoko actor exposing a query function returning static site info including name, tagline, and hero CTA.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping requirements to affected frontend files and components with metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of various frontend source files for quick reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and CSS variable definitions providing light/dark theme tokens and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file setting metadata, root mount point, and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with ThemeProvider for theme support.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer component with branding, navigation links, social icons, and contact scroll handling.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper composing navbar, routed content outlet, footer, and theme color provider.
frontend/src/components/SiteNavbar.tsx: Responsive navbar defining required navigation links with theme switching and color presets.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialsSlid: React slider component showing rotating travel testimonials with navigation controls.
frontend/src/components/ThemeColorProvid: Provides theme color context using useThemeColor and exposes presets and updater.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and stored identity handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future React Query backend hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useSiteInfo.ts: Fetches site info from the backend actor with fallback values when unavailable.
frontend/src/hooks/useThemeColor.ts: Manages theme color presets, storing selection and applying CSS variables dynamically.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base config defining CSS variables and themes for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: About page with hero, story section, and values grid describing the travel agency.
frontend/src/pages/Booking.tsx: A booking form page that handles user input, auto-fills package names from URL params, and shows a confirmation message after submission.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Homepage with a hero section, featured destinations, and a contact form with basic submission handling.
frontend/src/pages/HoneymoonOffers.tsx: Displays a list of honeymoon travel packages with details, images, and pricing.
frontend/src/pages/Privacy.tsx: Static privacy policy page outlining data collection, usage, security, and cookies.
frontend/src/pages/Services.tsx: Services overview page presenting various travel-related offerings with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/TourGuide.tsx: Page presenting tour guide highlights with hero, descriptive sections, features, and an image showcasing guide qualities.
frontend/src/pages/TourPackages.tsx: Displays a list of tour packages with details, images, and navigation, structured with a hero section and package grid.
frontend/src/pages/Vehicles.tsx: Shows a fleet of vehicles with specs, pricing, features, and images, including a hero and grid layout.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme tokens, colors, fonts, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing requirements, features, architecture notes, and overall build state for the travel agency site.
